DOC.brief_title: SuperSTAT Noninvasive Blood Pressure Monitor Evaluation
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion Signed informed consent Ability single dual monitor NIBP , ECG , and/or SpO2 , whether already monitor parameter . Exclusion Criteria Any subject deem unstable , clinician 's discretion , participate study Any subject cardiac anomaly would cause disparity aortic pressure periphery . Any subject tolerate , opinion clinician , multiple blood pressure measurement Known disease state medical condition A ) compromise circulation extremity ( y ) , B ) compromise musculoskeletal integrity , C ) otherwise contraindicate use NIBP cuff and/or SpO2 sensor extremity ECG patch skin Excessive movement excitability cause false value determination ( SP10 accuracy study )
